Hard to say whether it violates the rules or not. Could you elaborate upon your meaning, please?
It's meant to be taken like :hailprobe:, except a little different.

Like hailprobe? Hailprobe has a long and well defined history and origin. I can't find squat on this one. Did you make this up? Do explain.
